Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2007 07:41PM PaulaBeth wrote: I have a couple of hints. Hydrogen Peroxide is a really healing mouth rinse. If you can't stand the taste, mixing it with water helps. B vitamins aren't very effective alone. Taking B-complex makes the B-6 work better. My onc said to take 50 mg. I take 200 mg. in addition to the 100 mg. that's in the B-complex.

Posts.Content: Jul 30, 2007 09:25AM PaulaBeth wrote: For future PETs, you might check cost, too. My local hospital charged $4500 for a very poor quality scan from a mobile unit. At PET Imaging at OU Medical Center a much better PET/CT only costs $2200.
